description: Activation registration parity baseline for Plan 062. Used by integration check to verify all registrations are present after refactor.

guardInvariants: LM tools must not register if Python bridge is broken (Plan 051/056)
Chat participant must degrade gracefully if not initialized (Plan 032)

notes: Commands must match package.json contributes.commands IDs exactly
LM tool names must match package.json contributes.languageModelTools name field exactly
Chat participant ID must match package.json contributes.chatParticipants id exactly
declaredButNotRegistered commands are defined in package.json but not yet implemented in source
